CONVERSATION GROUP: The first half of this conversation has been moved into a cutscene, but I didn't want to delete them from the conversation so we can keep the VO and text somewhere... also in case we end up rolling back. So now, when this conversation kicks off, it jumps immediately to the part I care about.
BK Enough. My name is Javen Tarmikos. I know you are members of the Burning Dawn. I know your foul lords are calling to you in your dreams. Are you prepared to repent for your sins?7
[Banagar lifts his weapon and slays both guild members, right where they kneel.]
VO DIRECTION [Screaming... at end] Quiet, fool! They'll know we're here!
[Tarmikosand his dudes turn and walk off, deeper into the caves. They leave the bodies of the slain guild members there to rot.]
[Belamy runs off, deeper into the cave.]
[As the party reaches the ledge, they look down to see a knight in shining armor standing over two bound-and-kneeling captives.]

*Not 100% liking this line. Lots of dos. But  couldn't improve it.
Do not question me, knight. The spawn of the Abyss is never without guile or opportunity to do evil. Do as I say:  End them!
